goals__remit:
ECOO's vision is to improve vision and eye health by providing high-quality, cost-effective optometric and optical services across Europe. 
 
ECOO's mission is:  
- to improve eye health and vision for all and eliminate avoidable blindness and visual impairment in Europe. 
- to create a harmonised professional and educational system for optometry and optics based on the European Diploma in Optometry and the European Qualifications in Optics. 
- to develop the scope of practice for optometrists and opticians to the degree that the same high standards apply and are mutually recognised in all European countries
